name: Pink Onion
author: Karin B.
description: Back AGAIN because this place is Delicious!  Adorable casual comfortable yet simple rustic elegance could also describe the place.  The couple who runs it are wonderful and the food amazing!  Love the meatballs!  Margherita Pizza add mushrooms and onions & a side salad.  The spaghetti is also fabulous!  Really want to try everything but I live over an hour away and every time I come to the city I can't bare to leave without those meatballs & that pizza crust!  Highly recommend!!!
